title: Champion Selection in 4 regions (NA, EU, KR, CN) so far, Who's Next
body:

43/123 EU
45/123 KR
53/123 CN
---

Who's Next? What champions do you want to see or do you think are coming up? 

* *Edit to correct errors and to make it pretty* Let me know if there are any other issues.

replies.body:
I hope I get to see {{champion:50}} again. I've heard Vizi plays him and Quas might idk, but I really wanna see a midlane Swain. I haven't seen anyone do well as mid Swain yet. I think the last time he was mid was when Kerp picked him, and he went like 0/6.

I also wanna see {{champion:3}} {{champion:75}} {{champion:82}}
I want to see some dirty Shaco play.{{champion:35}}
Isn't all Shaco play Dirty? {{champion:9}}  is even more dirty!
Fixed an error in the listing (Multiple Errors) /Failure!

**Updated for the end of NA LCS Week 2** 
and all other regions up to Sunday 1st.
